We are all in this together, and remember the simple steps we can each take to fight this virus. Wash your hands thoroughly and often, stay home if you are sick, and remember that you are not only protecting yourself, but the most vulnerable among us.

The Senate will also remain in session next week, and I look forward to reaching a bipartisan solution to help the American people facing both the health and financial challenges posed by #coronavirus.
